content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, I'm glad you like the apartment. I'm sure you understand that I want to get the best possible price for it. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are interested in renting the apartment. I am a student and therefore I am looking for the lowest possible price. How about we start with 350 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a very low offer, Farhad. I can tell you are a student who is not familiar with the housing market in Duisburg. The average rent for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center is around 700 euros. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is far below the market value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but I am a dependable and responsible student. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord. How about we meet somewhere in the middle and say 550 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, I appreciate your attempt to meet me halfway. However, I believe the apartment's value is much higher than your offer. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the apartment is worth more than what you are offering.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, I am a smart student, not easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord. I am willing to pay 600 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, your offer is still too low for the apartment's value. I appreciate your efforts to negotiate, but I believe the apartment is worth more than what you are offering. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the apartment is worth more than what you are offering.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view. However, I am a smart student, not easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord. I am willing to pay 650 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, your offer is getting closer to the market value, but it's still not enough for the apartment's value. I appreciate your efforts to negotiate, but I believe the apartment is worth more than what you are offering. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the apartment is worth more than what you are offering.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, I am a smart student, not easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord. I am willing to pay 700 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
